*"Hickory dickory dock*  
*The mouse ran up the clock*   
*The clock struck one*   
*The mouse ran down*    
*Hickory dickory dock."*   

Hercule Poirot franziu a testa e chamou:    
-- Miss Lemon!   
-- Diga, M. Poirot.   
-- Há três erros nesta carta!
